guidanceModes.title: Guidance modes
guidanceModes.subtitle: Triangle of Flowing Energy
guidanceModes.selectPrompt: Tap a mode to explore how KIAAN guides your state.

innerPeace.title: Inner Peace
innerPeace.description: Find stillness through breath-focused exercises and gentle grounding techniques. Perfect for moments when you need to calm your mind and reconnect with tranquility.

mindControl.title: Mind Control
mindControl.description: Develop focused clarity through structured mindfulness practices. Ideal for decision-making, concentration, and maintaining inner discipline.
mindControl.note: Steady steps, one thought at a time

selfKindness.title: Self Kindness
selfKindness.description: Cultivate compassion for yourself through warm, supportive exercises. Essential for healing, self-acceptance, and nurturing your emotional well-being.

clarityPause.title: Clarity Pause
clarityPause.subtitle: Create space before you act.
clarityPause.description: No advice. Just space to decide from clarity.
clarityPause.note: KIAAN stays untouchedâ€”decline to pass through instantly.
clarityPause.question: Are you acting from clarity or from emotion right now?
